author: Bloomberg News
title: Stock futures fall as investors brace for the next barrage of bad news: corporate earnings
description: Corporate reports due in the next few weeks will provide investors some of the most vivid detail to date on the devastation wrought by the coronavirus
content:
American stocks, up 25 per cent in three weeks, ran into turbulence on the eve of earnings season, with futures on benchmark indexes falling in holiday-thinned trading.
June contracts on the S&P 500 were down 1.2 per cent at 5:00 a.m. in New York after s… [+2717 chars]
